text: Working for the city was a mostly positive experience. The only issues I ever experienced were with other employees who didn't seem to care about the job or abused their title/seniority.
Productive and fun team to work with. Management team is great to work for and genuinely wants to get to know their employees. Great place to begin or continue your career.

Great place to grow and develop as a young professional; . Very team-oriented culture. Management open and very approachable — both with respect to day-to-day operations and with to long-term growth initiatives. Generous amount of vacation time, extensive health benefits, education support (not formal policy but treated on case-by-case basis)
great people to work with and great work environment and a wonderful experience . i learned a lot a of helpful skills and gained great experience that will help me in the future.
Although they had their managerial problems, I always enjoyed going in to work for the city of Fredericton. Every day was a positive learning experience.
my time at the guard was great. my employer worked us hard and showed us desipline. we learned how to work as a team and how to stay focued under high presure and stress
pros: most days were to hot to do parade
cons: you had to stand still for hours at a time

text: Excellent work experience. Friendly and hardworking staff. The work environment was also a very positive work environment.
assist with meter reading, maintenance of various areas throughout the city and help residents.
City of Fredericton offers summer positions in many different areas for university students. Work outdoors and meet new people.
